segments.text: I notice the dish towel bunched tightly in the woman’s hands, and it feels so mundane.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, beneath the surface, everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to thrive on that chaos, motivated by sweet rewards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how close they are to a potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so proud as he reaches for those cookies, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart race, thinking about what could happen if the stool tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s fascinating how life can be so ordinary yet so perilous at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
